participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, Alex thrives on staying active and exploring new fitness routines. He enjoys a straightforward approach to life.
participant_1.background: eating is something i do when i am bored. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i've short hair. two dogs live with me.

participant_2.name: Sara
participant_2.personality: Determined and passionate, Sara is driven by her ambition to succeed in law. She has a strong connection to her roots and values tradition.
participant_2.background: i'm from a small town. i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i was raised on a horse farm.
